授業目的: Continuing from the first semester we aim to further build skills for writing clearly and convincingly in English. We will move from the paragraph to longer pieces of writing. We will be covering a lot of material and it is essential students complete assignments on time.
到達目標: Continuing from the first semester we aim to further build skills for writing clearly and convincingly in English. We will move from the paragraph to longer pieces of writing. We will be covering a lot of material and it is essential students complete assignments on time.
授業の概要・背景: This class will be online consisting of on demand elements, and live Zoom classes; you must prepare at least 45 mins before the class, and the Zoom meeting will last 45 mins. Additionally you will need some time to do assignments and other homework.

Weeks 4 & 5 Process paragraph
Weeks 6 & 7 Comparison/Contrast paragraph
Weeks 8 & 9 Definition paragraph
Weeks 10 - 12 Essay organization
Weeks 13 & 14 Opinion essay
